outputs.output_descr: This is a preparatory project. The expertise will be pooled from individual and institutions of Small & Medium sector process heat applications, solar concentrator technologies, government, institutional, and training capacities to develop the Full Scale Proposal (FSP). Expertise will be sought from both national and international consultants.

project_descr: Market Development and Promotion of Solar Concentrators Based Process Heat Applications in India.
project_title: Market Development and Promotion of Solar Concentrators
